Having hung up my dedicated Sci-fi Movie and TV model work for the time being, I've decided to concentrate on more dedicated, original Packs. There are some movies and shows that have a great potential for a pack, such the Space 1999 - it could be made into an incredible pack (so many modules and parts). Making these provides alot of enjoyment, but at the same time doesn't allow you to explore any of your own ideas or creations. Recently I had the fortunate opportunity to join forces with Sirkut, who seems to be alot more proficient in the plugin side of things than I am, so this will hopefully make a great combination where we can make unique, original parts and also provide plugin support for them. Weve only just begun working together so bear with us while we sort out the time zones and projects.

The first pack I'll be modelling is..

The Magna-Tech Pack.

Project objectives:

  • The aim of this pack is to create a set of useful and unique parts that all roughly adhere to the same styling and principles (mainly electric or electro-magnetic propulsion and activation)
  • The pack will contain replacements for all stock items such as custom rover wheels, engines, fuel tanks,parachutes, docking clamps, command modules etc.
  • One main goal for this pack is to not create cheat parts, but semi believable futuristic concepts that could possibly work. The fuel tanks will pretty much look like fuel tanks, the engines will of course be Ion flavoured for this pack also.
  • Animations! yes.. pretty much every single item will 'do something' I am a big fan of both functionality and eye candy and believe they can work together in harmony without looking like a lead acid battery attached to a tin can.
  • Ambiguity: All parts will serve some other purpose other than their intended one. This could be something wierd and wacky, or it could be completely stock, that I suppose will be the easter eggs in the pack. To be honest, even I don't know what I'm going to come up with some times, I like to model off the bat and just see what comes out of the day.

Over the coming weeks we will update this thread with all the wierd and wonderful creations that this pack will comprise of, be sure to check the thread regularly as I will be updating it almost daily.

(I will be reserving the next post also incase this one gets too large!)

Most of the pack built so far has been the more complex pieces like the wheels, but they are done and I can move onto the rest of the stock parts.

HMV-1 Mono Hover Wheel

(and yes, I finally did a video in a higher res! )

Since the idea failed so miserably on the first attempt, the wheel was redesigned into the HMV-1, but this is still being developed.

(for other modders wanting to try a monowheel, you cant put anything inside a spherical convex collider! so making a wheel and monowheel in the one is hard, but im trying!
